entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:09 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 9:00 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -9.4°C
Pressure: 103.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -15.0°C
Wind: NE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the morning then changing to freezing rain near noon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain late in the evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
